author: Somhairle Cinnsealach
title: #ThatWasTrashRemy In Wide Circulation On Twitter After Remy Ma Drops "Another One"
text:
68 
The internet erupted earlier last week when Remy Ma dropped ‚Äú SHETHER ,‚Äù an unexpected twist in a feud between the two women that has actually been brewing for years. 
The diss track created a stir, adding fuel to the fire with claims that Nicki Minaj couldn‚Äôt have sex with Meek Mill for 90 days after she got surgical enhancement ‚Äî and spread rumors that the ‚ÄúAnaconda‚Äù rapper had slept with Trey Songz and Hot 97 host Ebro (claims that have since been denied by all involved). 
Remy has clearly enjoyed her the notoriety, because on Thursday night (March 2) she dropped a second diss track called ‚Äú Another One .‚Äù Twitter went crazy once again, but this time not all of the feedback was positive. People have responded so poorly to ‚ÄúAnother One‚Äù that the hashtag #ThatWasTrashRemy started to circulate. At this point, this is Remy Ma beef with Nicki Minaj. #AnotherOne pic.twitter.com/MLX83IV6BD
